author: {'steamid': '76561198064388679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 205, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1705005580}
review:
Surprisingly smooth on keyboard for a simulation. Got first on first try in Quick Race but of course it was at the easiest difficulty with AI at the lowest level and no damage; i like it casual as usual. Still, it's more enjoyable than many other racing games because the steering input is also responsive despite V-Sync On.

There is a whole range of keys you could map and it's easy to run out of keys; if you try you would encounter 'This key is already mapped to..." It's good that you could configure many functions but at this early stage i just wanna get going.

It has a lot to offer for a free game with no DLCs. [b]8/10[/b] at least IMO.

[b][u]Update[/u][/b]
Malware detected in marcas.exe. Sorry to uninstall this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137052678', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 1041, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1041, 'last_played': 1694176776}
review:
You have to look at this as a demo version because that's what it really is. There isn't a ton of content, four cars and six tracks, but what is there works 100 %. You can do single races or a small championship and of course just training sessions f.e. to work on setups. Don't expect state of the art graphics as this is about ten years old. Expect GTR2 level which is totally fine by me. The upside is you can run this on the proverbial calculator. I have a below average machine by todays standards and get up to 200 fps easy.
The FFB is really good. If you are experiening problems that the wheel is too hard or just tilts to one side or the other you have to set the FFB force to negative values. That's mostly the case with Logitech wheels. I was surprised about the AI. I did a race on every track and there wasn't one serious issue with AI drivers. Just the usual race incicents which is totally fine.
Is it worth playing then ? Well that depends. If you need top graphics for immersion: no. 
Maybe you want to start sim-racing and aren't sure it's your thing ? This is as good a starting point as any. 
I got about 20 hours out of something that cost me nothing and I probably would play a little more if I hadn't tons of other sims. But I enjoyed having something different then GT3 and a couple of tracks I never raced on until now.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979953970', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 490, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1691318822}
review:
Disclamer: It's free to play, but looks like it might be getting delisted from Steam in the near future due to expiring licenses. So, go and grab it.

Yes, this is a glorified rFactor mod, but... well is that really a negative thing? It's free, and rFactor was amazing, so straight out of the box you'll get great physics for a previous generation simulator and good AI. I booted it up just to take a look and had immediate fun driving a Lancer at Interlagos. it's good old rFactor, great stuff.

And for people interested in gaming history, this how the Automobilista series began.

author: {'steamid': '76561198991621802', 'num_games_owned': 16, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1697131725}
review:
"Avalia√ß√µes neutras"

isso √© o que acontece quando as crian√ßas do Need for Speed resolvem jogar um simulador de corridas de verdade. "AAAAIIIIINNN, A JOGABILIDADE √â HORR√çVEL", "AAAIIINNN, QUE GR√ÅFICO FEIOUN", pfff...

Enfim, meu tempo de jogo no Steam talvez indique que eu nem encostei no jogo, mas o fato √© que eu joguei o Copa antes de ele sair no Steam, e dediquei uma boa quantidade de horas nele. Sim, √© verdade que o jogo n√£o tem visuais matadores, afinal de contas, porque usa um engine com mais de dez anos nas costas. Mesmo assim, n√£o √© terrivelmente feio quando em movimento. Uma caracter√≠stica dos jogos feitos nesse engine (grande parte dos melhores simuladores de corrida o utiliza) √© a excepcional capacidade de se lidar com os detalhes realmente importantes de um SIMULADOR de corridas (coisa que essa galerinha do Need for Speed n√£o sabe o que √©), como uma f√≠sica realista e a intelig√™ncia artificial dos advers√°rios que, no Copa, assim como nos outros jogos que o utilizam, s√£o excepcionais. Ele foi produzido pela Reiza, o mesmo est√∫dio que produziu o elogiad√≠ssimo Game StockCar Extreme, que √© utilizado como simulador e meio de treinamento pelos pr√≥prios pilotos da StockCar (ver aqui: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yTIiGZ7F7GE ).

Entenda, o Copa √© um jogo gratuito produzido para fins publicit√°rios. Portanto, n√£o espere a mais extensa lista de carros e pistas, mas o que tem nele √© o bastante para entreter qualquer aficionado por simuladores de corrida. Ele simula o Campeonato Brasileiro de Marcas, tamb√©m conhecido como Copa Petrobras de Marcas, mas sem os nomes reais dos pilotos, com alguns modelos desatualizados em rela√ß√£o aos que correm atualmente, e sem o Honda Civic. Mas voc√™ ainda tem o Chevrolet Cruze, o Ford Focus, o Toyota Corola e o Mitsubishi Lancer pra brincar nos aut√≥dromos brasileiros como Interlagos, Goi√¢nia, Velopark, etc.

√â recomendado usar um volante de qualidade para aproveitar o jogo, mas n√£o √© algo obrigat√≥rio. Se voc√™ procura um √≥timo simulador de carros de rua com tra√ß√£o dianteira, preparados para as pistas, o Copa √© imperd√≠vel. E o melhor, de gra√ßa! E essa talvez seja sua maldi√ß√£o, porque sendo gratuito, ele acaba atraindo todo tipo de doido que n√£o entende sua proposta, e sai falando mal por a√≠. √â meio como o maluco reclamar de Flight Simulator porque ele n√£o √© t√£o *NeScAu RaDiCaL* quanto Ace Combat.

Ent√£o, se voc√™ faz parte da tchurminha do barulho que curte um bate-bate, tiro porrada e bomba, v√° l√° procurar um Need for Speed ou Burnout, que se adequem mais ao seu gosto. Se voc√™ curte simula√ß√£o, seja bem vindo.

This reminds me of rFactor a lot. The UI and the graphics kinda had something in common I suppose.

author: {'steamid': '76561199082922661', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1697930996}
review:
so right away i can tell you that this game is an introduction to Sim Racing. What drew me to it right away is that it operates and feels like a good retro sim racing product with updated textures. It honestly reminded me of NASCAR Racing 2003. Comparing it to a newer more polished Sim, I would say try something like this game before jumping headfirst into something like Asseto Corsa or iRacing. Its a forgiving game in terms of force feedback and spinning, but very tough to be consistent. 

I don't know why people gave this negative reviews as you don't even have to pay for the game. I would say take it as face value and don't have high expectations and I guarantee you will have at least one positive thing to say about this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198302893219', 'num_games_owned': 41, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1675049310}
review:
Note: This is a sim racing game, so don't expect the controller or keyboard to work very well with this game, also don't listen to the negative reviews by players who use said control methods. Another thing is that it is locked in first person, which some find annoying but I only use first person in sim racing games so I don't have any problems with it. This is a game (like most games) that usually requires 2-5 hours to come up with a verdict or opinion on, so give this game a real chance before dumping on it.

PROS:
-Unique cars, not many games even have Brazilian stock cars, so being able to drive them in a sim is great
-Good physics, its essentially an rfactor mod, so the physics act the way you'd expect them to act
-Good FFB, the ffb is good but make sure to make it negative because the positive will help you steer for some reason
-Good tracks, my personal favorite is interlagos for racing, Goiania for hotlapping
-Easy to run, the game was made in 2014 and has some pretty bare bones graphics (which isnt to the games detriment), so its really easy to run
-Championship mode, there is a championship mode, pretty nice
-AI is good, but can be aggressive, make sure to set the ai aggression to 0, cuz they can ruin your race, qualifying if you get too close

CONS
-Assisted steering, I set the FFB to +75 because that usually works for me, but it kept steering for me, turns out you have to set the FFB to a negative value which I find weird
-Can be limited, not a big problem since this game is essentially a test for the devs other games, but for those that enjoy this game in specific, there's not much past the championship mode, and no online

Things to look out for (not all cons but can present themselves as such if you don't look out for them)
-Unfamiliar cars/tracks, most people aren't too familiar with brazilian stock cars or tracks, and some aren't familiar with any variation of stock car, so the bars and such in the cockpit can obstruct your view, that combined with the unfamiliar tracks can really make it hard to drive sometimes, but all you gotta do if this is a problem for you is to put extra time into practice, and warmups so that you can do qualifying and racing on a track you've gained familiarity in
-The assisted steering FFB thing, yes it happens even with assisted steering off
-The AI can be very aggressive so just set the aggression to 0, and you should be good

Overall
Definitely a game worth downloading and playing! A game that is very easy to pick a car, start a championship, and get lost in! Also very good for practicing against AI in a sim before starting online races. Overall an 8/10, a very fun and unique experience, I would definitely recommend downloading this and giving it a shot!

review:
N√£o se iludam por coment√°rios do tipo: "Jogabilidade p√©ssima". Esse √© um t√≠tulo de simula√ß√£o PURA, ent√£o √© mais que necess√°rio um volante com Force Feedback pra desfrutar da real jogabilidade.
Gr√°ficos s√£o Ok.
Qualidade Sonora no Geral √© Ok tambem.
Agora em termos de F√≠sica, a√≠ o jogo BRILHA! A F√≠sica √© melhor do que muitos jogos por a√≠, tipo Project Cars, Forza Motorsport, e em alguns aspectos, melhor at√© do que Automobilista 2.
A Reprodu√ß√£o das Pistas √© fidedigna sim, n√£o confiem nesses comet√°rios tipo: "Interlagos parece pista de kart"... tadinho do dono desse coment√°rio, nunca deve ter nem entrado dentro de Interlagos.

Enfim, junto com Race Room, este √© o melhor t√≠tulo pra quem est√° iniciando no Automobilismo Virtual e n√£o quer gastar nenhum centavo.

review: this game is literally the most fun I've had not doing something properly. as a racing SIM it's an easy 8/10. physics are great. races are great. ect. it's missing some of the stuff that as a beginner I'd like (more teaching to learn breaking and racing line and such, especially as I'm not familiar with Brazilian tracks and am using a controller) but the fact you can turn off all rules and realism and go against traffic having fun on random tracks in free practice and causing massive collision brings me to a nostalgia I never knew I had.

author: {'steamid': '76561199131093058', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1641444626}
review: This game is actually a little impressive with licensed cars despite a free-to-play racing game, decent graphic, and small download size for a sim racing game. So, why I don't recommend it? Because, the game is extremely laggy, especially if you want to start a race. You have to wait for around 10-15 minutes just to load a track & cars. This is problematic, especially if you want jump into racing quickly (considering RACE 07, another sim racing game that's released 7 years prior this game and still runs well). So, if you want a sim racing game with small size & better performance, I'd recommend you to pick RACE 07, GTR 2 FIA GT, GT Legends, or anything else instead

author: {'steamid': '76561198008593279', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1645043053}
review:
Tried this game on my old laptop that runs some decent games like Assetto Corsa (GTR Evolution, Rfactor, RRE, LFS, TOCARD3 etc)

ASUS - X555LN-XO244H Laptop  (15.6", 1366 x 768)
Intel Core i7-4510U Dual Core / NvidiaGeForce 840M 2Gb
Ram: 4GB DDR3L-1600 
HDD: HGST 1TB 5400rpm

This is my new PC: 
‚óæÔ∏è AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
‚óæÔ∏è Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 Ti 8GB GDDR6 Twin Edge LHR
‚óæÔ∏è RAM - G.SKILL Ripjaws V 16GB (2x8GB) DDR4 3200MHz CL16 
‚óΩÔ∏è SSD M.2 2280 Western Digital Black SN750 500GB 3D NAND NVMe
‚óæÔ∏è Motherboard - ATX Gigabyte B550 Aorus Elite V2
‚óæÔ∏è PSU - Seasonic Core GM 650W Semi Modular 80PLUS Gold 

In both cases I had to spend a lot of time troubleshooting because the game went wrong for some reasons, stutering FPS drops and crashes. It was related to the original rFactor engine. 

This wheel on high or full FFB settings will give trouble and FPS drops because the engine is not optimized for it! 
‚óæÔ∏è Logitech G923

Also I had to run the game in compatibility mode for older windows8. 

Had some problems at start but after working a lot of time on them found the solutions and after the first few seconds of proper driving I am amazed how good this game is!

author: {'steamid': '76561199175463501', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1636228090}

author: {'steamid': '76561198191512929', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1597200008}
review:
Es un mod de mierda del RFactor, asi que si tenes el RFactor este juego te lo va a romper, y te lo va a hacer injugable.

Aparte del hecho de que te rompe otros juegos en tu biblioteca de Steam, el juego en si no funciona 99,99% de las veces. Probe todas las soluciones posibles que hay y parece que si decide funcionar o no es algo completamente al azar.

La rara vez que pude jugar, es uno de los peores juegos que jugue en mi vida. Es el EFootball de los juegos de carrera.

A cualquier persona que valore su biblioteca de Steam y su computadora y quiera evitar que les pase algo malo, no se descarguen esta mierda malware disfuncion erectil codeada en HTML. Juego de mierda.

author: {'steamid': '76561198397949304', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1017, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1017, 'last_played': 1568081480}
review:
I remember back in the day when i was poor and this was the only racing game i could play (aside trackmania). The graphics is amazing for me back in the day, but it is outdated by today (or 2014) standard. This kickstarted my goal of saving money for assetto corsa and other racing titles. The gameplay was actually quite nice for a free game with actual AI that can drive and the cars feels amazing. Still don't know why the reviews is mixed, for a game that was made to promote an oil company I'd say that this is a good free racing game make by a dev that have somewhat of a background in racing sim like Automobilista. Did i mention that this game is buggy af

 6 /10 pardon the poor grammar.

review:
Incrivelmente de gra√ßa e de qualidade para um jogo de 2014. Desenvolvedora √© BR e tamb√©m produtora do Automobilista 2.

Jogo √© um simulador b√°sico, ent√£o o m√≠nimo esperado √© configurar o volante ou teclado direito. Se voc√™ olhar todas as cr√≠ticas negativas do jogo, s√£o de pessoas esperando por um Forza gr√°tis, onde √© tudo autom√°tico e j√° vem com os controles configurados. Durante o jogo √© poss√≠vel configurar em quantos graus o volante pode girar, embreagem autom√°tica, sequ√™ncial ou H e outros. Seria o mesmo que comparar FLIGHT SIMULATOR com ACE COMBAT 7, ou comparar FORZA/NFS HEAT com ASSETO CORSA/PROJECT CARS. Ambos s√£o bons jogos, mas de p√∫blicos totalmente diferentes.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993304005', 'num_games_owned': 5486, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1618935725}
review:
While feeling more like a demo than a full-fledged game, it is a fun, exciting, and good-looking touring car racing experience showcasing the Brazilian series.

Positive:
- All tracks are surprisingly very good for a free game. There are six different ones in various regions of Brazil and they are all unique and with much attention to detail, which means there will be cities and monuments in the background. There is even careful attention in the placement of local flora depending on which part of the country the track is in.
- In the garage, the player is allowed to tweak and tinker with several mechanical and technical options of the car. This is nice but most of the default settings are fine.
- Options are plentiful. One can personalize many settings regarding difficulty and rules, which is great for fine-tuning the driving and racing experience to a variety of player skill levels, resulting in a range of experiences.
- Overall good performance in terms of frame rate and high-quality settings. The game usually stayed at around 144 frames per second, but sometimes dipped into the upper 90s/lower 100s.

Neutral:
- While the sound design is generally good, it seems like all cars (regardless of manufacturer) make the exact same sounds.
- The championship mode is basic and bare-bones, but it is there, including the earning of points and progression in the driver standings.

Negative:
- There are some bugs that are major problems with qualifying sessions. At the start of qualifying for each race in the championship, the game automatically takes you out of the pit lane (the player has no control over this). For the Goi√¢nia qualifying session, the game crashes the player car and it cannot be moved. For the Velopark qualifying session, the game simply does not take the player out of the pit lane. This means that the player cannot participate in the qualifying sessions for those races of the championship.

Overall rating: 3.5/5.0

author: {'steamid': '76561198006267809', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1666402599}
review:
Now, let's be realistic. It is an old game and there's a limited selection of cars and tracks. That said, if you're just looking to shoot the breeze in a racing game and don't have a computer that hovers or the money for a "proper" racing sim, this one comes recommended. 

With my G27 wheel set, it feels around about what a car should feel like (having never driven the cars in real life, I couldn't say) and the car does respond as you'd expect when you do the wrong thing.  Force feedback offers a welcome challenge.

The interface is clean and things are easy to find - in fact, it appears to use rFactor as its engine, so it's got a solid base. No multiplayer, sadly, but I consider that a non-issue considering the purchase price.

The best part for me is that it doesn't need a whole lot of computer to play.  The specs are about what you'd get from a AU$400 laptop.  A steering wheel is definitely a must, but one that will do just fine can be had on Amazon for about AU$55.  Word of advice, though - go to the Controls settings first, I jumped straight in and found that I couldn't move because accelerator out was set to full brake...

TL;DR: Considering the price, you get a lot.  It runs on rFactor, a good engine to begin with. Spend a little more on a wheel and you're set.

review: N√£o compreendo e acho profundamente injustas as an√°lise negativas a este jogo. O Copa Petrobras √© um simulador hardcore portanto se est√£o habituados a jogos Arcade este jogo n√£o √© para voc√™s. Desenvolvido pela Reiza podem contar com boas f√≠sicas e bom force-feedback. O motor gr√°fico assente no j√° velhinho Rfactor acusa os sinais do tempo, mas continua agrad√°vel com bons modelos, texturas e at√© um ciclo dia/noite. O som est√° tamb√©m globalmente a um bom n√≠vel. Aconselho vivamente especialmente a todos que querem experimentar um simulador mas que receiam investir. Comprem um volante, descarreguem o jogo a custo 0 e experimentem conduzir os diferentes carros em ex√≥ticas pistas Brasileiras (Interlagos √© uma delas). Relativamente aos que j√° s√£o veteranos nos simuladores aconselho tamb√©m a adicionarem este jogo na vossa biblioteca simplesmente porque o mesmo oferece um conte√∫do diferenciado que complementa a vossa experi√™ncia no mundo da simula√ß√£o.

review: Awesome physics, graphics look pretty good running on a ultrawide here, not far behind most recent stuff. Cars are really fun to drive and should support most wheels on the market. Some things are missing out of the box (spotter, for instance) but I found it reasonably manageable to mod it every now and then. FOV is adjustable but camera movements are not so much. If you got a wheel, I think one of Reiza's is a must, this one would a be free one to try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133443235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1584873859}
review:
The game itself was quite fun. Personally I didn't know anything about this series. The cars, the sounds, and the track were very good. I was surprised, because the AI is quite intelligent, it always tried to overtake me on racional points. The froce feedback was the only weird thing for me.

I recommend it for you,  if you want to have some fun, but if you want a professional sim I wouldn't say it's your game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054635771', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1582427831}
review:
Copa Petrobras de Marcas √© um simulador de corridas gratuito desenvolvido pela Reiza Studios (mesmos desenvolvedores de Automobilista e Stock Car Extreme), usando a engine IsiMotor2 (a mesma do RFactor 1, GTR 2, etc).

Come√ßando pelos pontos negativos, porque n√£o s√£o tantos assim. A interface n√£o √© muito polida, o que j√° se espera de um jogo gratuito obscuro desses. Os menus s√£o feios e n√£o muito intuitivos, mas possuem uma vasta gama de op√ß√µes para personalizar as regras e o n√≠vel de realismo das corridas. Outro ponto negativo √© a qualidade das pistas em si, n√£o possuem propor√ß√µes realistas e parecem muito mais curtas do que as pistas reais nas quais s√£o inspiradas. Interlagos, por exemplo, √© bizarramente pequena nesse jogo.

Agora aos pontos positivos. Esse jogo foca em simula√ß√£o realista da modalidade esportiva de Stock Car brasileira. √â poss√≠vel simular uma corrida de Stock Car completa, com dura√ß√£o a sua escolha, treino, qualificat√≥ria, volta de apresenta√ß√£o e tudo mais. O jogo espera que voc√™ siga as regras do automobilismo, e simula desgaste de pneus, uso de combust√≠vel, danos no ve√≠culo, entre outros. O jogo possui v√°rias pistas brasileiras e uma pequena sele√ß√£o de carros muito bem modelados. Tamb√©m possui um modo campeonato, no qual √© poss√≠vel simular toda a Copa Petrobr√°s de Marcas, que d√° nome ao jogo. 

Como todo simulador de corrida, esse jogo √© feito para ser jogado com volante e pedais. Por√©m, usu√°rios de controle v√£o perceber que esse jogo √© bem jog√°vel com gamepad. Eu jogo com um controle de PS4 e achei muito mais tranquilo do que Assetto Corsa, por exemplo. Isso n√£o quer dizer que n√£o seja dif√≠cil controlar o carro: a f√≠sica desse jogo √© bastante focada em realismo. Se voc√™ est√° acostumado com pseudo-simuladores como Gran Turismo e Forza, possivelmente vai acabar indo para a grama ou batendo em algum outro carro e ferrando com a sua corrida v√°rias vezes at√© pegar o jeito. Ainda assim, por se tratar de um produto gratuito, √© uma op√ß√£o interessante para come√ßar a mergulhar no mundo dos simuladores de corrida mais realistas. Caso prefira um simulador mais completo e com uma cena de mods madura, sem pagar muito, recomendo gastar uns trocadinhos e adquirir GTR 2, Race 07, Live for Speed ou mesmo Assetto Corsa em uma promo√ß√£o. Mas at√© l√°, Copa Petrobr√°s de Marcas pode te divertir por v√°rias horas sem gastar um tost√£o.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112810429', 'num_games_owned': 2594, 'num_reviews': 578, 'playtime_forever': 883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 883, 'last_played': 1580997891}
review:
Okay, this one is a hard case. Well, not really hard, but, if you see the reviews, half of them are downvotes. Now, I've checked all the negative reviews on Steam, and the main two problems of Copa Petrobras de Marcas are grown from the one root. It is the freeware driving simulator, sponsored by the Petrobras oil company as a promo action in 2014. And if you check the Petrobras stock prices, well, it falls down for about 35-40% after the year 2014. Obviously they have other issues to care about rather than providing additional funding for the tech support for the released promo freeware game.

The developer has other main titles to look for, such as Stock Car Extreme and Automobilista, and they are actually well-developed racing sims. While this one, freeware game, was thrown at the market in a somewhat undeveloped state. And who are the judges to send this game downhill? Well, yeah, mostly, 12-year-old schoolboys with some terrific hardware and zero-levelled patience skill.

I mean, the game has some very sophisticated menu to tune all your races, including the difficulty of your opponents and the help with steering from the game. In other words, if you want to play some tracks in tutorial mode, you can do it with about 10-12 mouse clicks in two subsections of the options menu, and then the game will show you how to drive "safely and responsibly" while remaining fast enough. For a realistic driving simulator. But most of the schoolboys go with "Duh! WASD doesn't work! I don't know how to drive there! the game sucks!" short response.

Now, for the game itself: you may try it if you have at least some patience and understanding the principles of racing organization. It does not have hyperbolic turbo-drive inherent to more casual driving games like the NFS series. In simulation driving games, the drive is not when you overtook 10 opponents per lap, but when you improved your lap time at least for a second to finally qualify and get to the start of the actual race... after several hours of training. If you are one of those hardcore virtual drivers and have a particular interest in Brazil racing tracks - you might actually like Copa Petrobras de Marcas despite its downfalls such as mediocre (for a 2014-year-game) visuals and sound work, some mess in the organization of the subsections in options, and not too rich choice of cars.

Also please keep in mind that it is a single-player-only project (despite the in-game chat option, left by the developers from some other game on the same engine). I guess I should remind that it is a 100% freeware game, and running servers for it would be really opposite from profitable.

All in all, this hardcore driving sim deserves a fair 6/10 rating mark. But you should really think twice before starting it if your main interest in playing games is the boredom-fighting. A racing wheel is highly recommended, by the way (while you can do some races with keyboard or a gamepad).

T√° errado po, desse jeito n√£o h√° desenvolvedora que queira fazer algo sobre o Braza. author: {'steamid': '76561198868319365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1584268385}
review:
WARNING: Not suitable for spoiled brats!

This is a racing sim. And it's a pretty damn good one. 

Pros:
- Full blooded sim. This is not a 'game'. Controller wielding and keyboard smashing children will be better of with something else on the market.
- Very, very good physics and FFB wheel support. It feels like actual driving, rFactor similar.
- Realistic wear system. Again, not for children.
- Nice graphics. Clear and vivid, no unnecessary fx overkill and all that BS.
- Completely free. No in-game puchases or micro transactions.
- No 'always online' single player BS. 
- Should run well on low/med spec rigs. Runs flawless on GTX 960 4GB / i7 6700HQ in 1920x1080x32.

Cons:
- None.

Nuances:
- Create new profile when starting and setting up for the first time. Default profile can cause steering wheel issues.
- Shadows processing can cause micro stuttering. This is a known issue. There is a workaround for this, but setting them to medium fixes it on the spot.
- Menu music is a bit annoying and somewhat infantile. But, still not gay as in Codemasters games, for example. [b]*EDIT: I have just succesfully changed default menu music to "Violent & Funky" by Infectious Grooves.*[/b]
- Tinkering with settings can set it up as a game, Why on earth would you want to do that in a racing sim? Kids will not play this anyway.

If you are a driver and not a 'gamer' do yourself a favor and get this absolute gem.
Highly recommended for amateur (like me) and pro drivers alike. Two thumbs up!

author: {'steamid': '76561198855896028', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1683053052}
review: As a Disclaimer I only have like 2 hours on this game but holy shit is it fun. It's plays really similarly to raceroom, but there isn't the janky ass physics or the unnecessary amount of money you have to sink to get all the content. It's pretty old and the graphics reflect that a little, but if you can ignore that it's a ton of fun. 100% recommend. It should be said that you'll need to remap the controls to WASD, but if you aren't a peanut brained monkey you'll have fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198253904338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1605662309}
review: I honestly love this game! One of the best free racing games on steam! While Raceroom is fun I think this game is better! Keep in mind though this game is a simulator! It's a really realistic sim! While some might dislike the engine noise I actually like it! Great maps, and great AI! I love the cars too! I love the way they feel! I'm A Big Time Toyota Fan! Also the music for this game is epic! It gets me hyped up and everything! I really recommend this game to hardcore racing and simulator fans! I'm for sure going to keep playing this game! While the controls are pretty difficult I recommend to keep trying new setups and stuff until it feels right for you! I spent a solid hour in the testing room changing the controls up! Also ignore the negative comments! Most of them haven't even played it for an hour! Overall this game is really good and if you spend a couple of hours making it feel right and practicing you'll have a grand old time! Rating: 100/100!

author: {'steamid': '76561198085631570', 'num_games_owned': 109, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1592450617}
review:
Curti muito n√£o. Os loadings s√£o extremamente demorados pra um jogo de gr√°ficos medianos. Em 2014 j√° existia DirectX 11, n√£o? Compensa pra quem for muito adepto de simuladores e √© at√© bom para um jogo gratuito. Mas para mim que estou acostumado com jogos mais, digamos, caprichados, esse n√£o supriu as necessidades. Achei as c√¢meras dispon√≠veis meio ruins e os controles poderiam ter sido mais aprimorados. √â um jogo de potencial, fico feliz que seja uma obra feita por brasileiros, mas este √© um tanto aqu√©m daquilo que o v√≠deo e os screenshots dele mostraram aqui na p√°gina dele da loja.

Vou recomendar apenas para valorizar o esfor√ßo que foi aplicado pelos desenvolvedores a fim de que o jogo resultasse em um simulador de corrida. Al√©m do mais, eu j√° vi muitos jogos, inclusive alguns de baixo or√ßamento, que foram desenvolvidos na mesma √©poca mas que possuem gr√°ficos infinitamente melhores. O jogo, para mim, cumpriu apenas parcialmente o proposto. Entretanto n√£o √© um jogo ruim.

review:
Jogo sensacional! Uma p√©rola da ind√∫stria de games brasileiros e algo que sonhava h√° muito tempo! Uma bela iniciativa pela populariza√ß√£o do automobilismo no Brasil.
O jogo foi, claramente, desenvolvido por quem entende e gosta de automobilismo. Todo o essencial de dirigibilidade voc√™ ir√° encontrar neste jogo que, sendo um jogador moderado de jogos de corrida como √© o meu caso, conseguir√° ter um √≥tima experi√™ncia mesmo sem um equipamento apropriado como os volantes da s√©rie Logitech ou Truthmaster. Jogo perfeitamente bem no meu controle de Xbox 360 que √© pau pra toda obra.
Como jogo de uma produtora pequena (e gratuito!) o jogo tem, obviamente, as suas limita√ß√µes que v√£o listadas abaixo:
1- A trilha sonora √© escassa, com apenas uma m√∫sica tema que √© uma guitarra de rock and roll bem daquelas de banda de fundo de garagem (mas, pra ser honesto, muito melhor que muita m√∫sica de produtora grande a√≠. AT√â QUE ENFIM UMA M√öSICA EM JOGO DE CORRIDA QUE N√ÉO SEJA UM MELODRAMA OU M√öSICA DE NINAR, TIPO A S√âRIE GRAND TURISMO, JOGOS DE F1 E TODOS MESMO EM GERAL!) Jogo de corrida tem que ser m√∫sica paulera mesmo! Mas √© isso, s√≥ tem uma m√∫sica tema;
2- N√£o h√° mudan√ßa de c√¢mera enquanto voc√™ dirige. Claro que a mais usada √© a interna mesmo, mas, se voc√™ quiser ter uma c√¢mera de fora, n√£o tem. Pra mim n√£o √© problema nenhum, mas √© uma limita√ß√£o;
3- N√£o h√° deforma√ß√£o do carro em batidas. Eu uma vez fodi o motor numa batida e um pneu fazendo uma sa√≠da desastrada dos boxes em Interlagos, mas n√£o h√° efeito visual de deforma√ß√µes.

Que eu me lembre as limita√ß√µes que vi s√£o essas. No mais, um grande jogo, um presente para os amantes de automobilismo! Muito obrigado aos desenvolvedores! O marketing funcionou comigo, que em breve vou comprar o Stock Car Extreme e o Automobilista. Valeu demais mesmoo!!!

I havent encountered any bugs

review: Copa Petrobras de Marcas is a great free racing game for low end computers. I'd give it a 8.5/10 for car detail and preformance, a 7/10 for the physics of tires that have been knocked off and things like that, a 9/10 for how the car handles like the real thing, and 9.5/10 for the music and fx. Overal its a realy good game and I'd recommend it if you dont want to spend any money.

review:
N√£o √© do meu tipo n√£o recomendar um jogo, mas nesse caso esse aqui n√£o tem como mesmo!

Primeiramente, vale lembrar que o jogo √© gratuito, ent√£o test√°-lo n√£o √© perda de tempo. O problema √© que ser gratuito n√£o √© carta branca pra ser horr√≠vel.

As op√ß√µes de resolu√ß√£o, vsync e outros detalhes importantes s√£o fora do jogo, se vc quiser mudar precisa sair do jogo pra colocar da maneira desejada. O jogo simplesmente bugou comigo, funcionando apenas em resolu√ß√µes p√©ssimas. Vale lembrar que meu pc roda Witcher 3 no ultra, GTA V no alto/muito alto, Ghost Recon Wildlands no alto, e v√°rios outros jogos de exelente qualidade gr√°fica, nesse caso, esse jogo utiliza um Directx 9.0, hardware pra aguentar esse jogo aqui n√£o falta.

A impress√£o que eu tenho √© que os desenvolvedores desse jogo nunca jogaram um game eletr√¥nico na vida. Deveriam pelo menos arrumar os bugs, colocar TODAS as op√ß√µes de customiza√ß√£o DENTRO do jogo.

One of the best racing games of all time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009852853', 'num_games_owned': 1380, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1546202917}
review:
This game is basically a demo of Stock Car Extreme or Automobilista. This same championship and cars are in Automobilista. My Xbox 360 controller works just fine, you just need to go into the settings and choose it. You can also tweek the settings to your liking. 

The graphics are good. The sounds are good. The handling is good too. Overall I think it is a decent game. The only thing "wrong" with ithe game is that it is limited to the one series of cars and tracks. Also you should know that there is no racing line, rewinds or track map like you see in other racing games. It is still fun racing but you need to learn the tracks to have any success. Thanks to Reiza for giving it away for FREE. If you like this game then you will like thier other racing games. Give it a try , you have nothing to lose.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000013555', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1646378010}
review:
Nonostante abbia poco tempo di gioco posso tranquillamente recensire 'Copa Petrobras de Maracas' visto che ho circa 200ore tra i vari Sim/SimArcade, pi√π di 700ore su Assetto Corsa e la vita persa su Live For Speed, quindi direi che so di cosa sto parlando.

Andiamo dritti al punto: non √® nient'altro che l'ennesima mod/reskin di rFactor1, come Automobilista, solo che questo √® gratuito, e meno male direi visto che abbiamo veramente pochi contenuti (anche se mi pareva fosse uscito inizialmente a pagamento - una follia).
La parte simulativa √® abbastanza curata e l'IA sembra comportarsi esattamente come quella di rFactor1 quindi vacilla tra manovre di fino a situazioni parecchio imbarazzanti.
Menu e schermate sono paro paro a quelle di rFactor con giusto qualche modifica a tema della competizione.
La grafica √® invalutabile visto che Reiza Studios si ostina a riproporre il motore di rFactor1 ed √® ci√≤ che di meglio si pu√≤ ottenere dalle ormai vecchie DX9. 
Il sonoro non √® il massimo, sembra di essere tornati nel 2005, almeno qui si poteva fare di meglio. Il gioco presenta anche una Musica di menu ma dava talmente fastidio che l'ho subito tolta.
La longevit√† √® limitata al relativo Campionato citato nel gioco, anche se potremmo risolvere con ulteriori mod (ammesso che ce ne siano).
Ho notato anche un piccolo inconveniente tecnico: il gioco non riesce a rappresentare 1080¬∞ di rotazione del volante, arriva ad un massimo di 900¬∞, perci√≤ se abbiamo il volante a 1080¬∞ √® meglio settarlo a 900¬∞ altrimenti sterzeremo meno di quanto pensiamo di fare.

Perch√® lo sconsiglio?
Beh diciamo che questo gioco/mod va bene per chi √® veramente agli inizi e non sa minimamente cosa comprare e quindi vuole sperimentare un attimo cosa significa passare da un Arcade ad un Sim, oppure per chi √® davvero un appassionato della Competizione..ma in ogni caso √® difficile innamorarsene, secondo me.

Per tutti gli altri SimDrivers sconsiglio vivamente anche solo pensare di scaricarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2563, 'playtime_forever': 686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 686, 'last_played': 1538821826}
review:
[h1]KOSTENLOS[/h1]

"Copa Petrobras de Marcas" ist eine Rennsimulation des brasilianischen Reiza Studios, basierend auf der rFactor Engine. Man kann es als kostenlose Demo oder auch als Vorarbeit zu "Stock Car Extreme" ansehen.

Die hier simulierte brasilianische Rennserie mag hierzulande recht unbekannt sein, √ºberm Teich ist sie daf√ºr ziemlich beliebt. Immerhin stellen mit Chevrolet, Ford, Mitsubishi und Toyota vier namhafte Hersteller die Fahrzeuge. Von den sechs enthaltenen brasilianischen Strecken kennt man hierzulande vorallem Interlagos. 

Die Fahrzeuge verf√ºgen rfactortypisch √ºber eine sehr reale Fahrphysik. Dies ist ein reinrassiger Simulator. In der Pr√§sentation wenig spektakul√§r, eher verschroben kompliziert daherkommend, steckt doch unter der Haube eine grandiose Simulation. 

Ohne Frage haben die Reiza-Studios mit "Automobilista" inzwischen eine geh√∂rige Schippe Simulation draufgelegt, f√ºr die alte Engine kann sich aber auch "Copa Petrobras de Marcas" auch heute noch sehen lassen.

Das Spiel fu√üt auf der rfactor-Engine, die grafisch sicherlich inzwischen deutlich in die Jahre gekommen ist, die aber physikalisch nach wie vor mit aktuellen Simulationen mithalten kann. Und so ist denn auch das Fahrverhalten der wesentliche und ausschlaggebende Pluspunkt, der aus dem angegrauten Nischentitel eine kleine Perle macht.

Der Ausdruck Simulation ist Programm. Deswegen ist auch zu einem guten Lenkrad anzuraten, allein schon um das klare und oft wichtige Force-Feedback wirklich zu sp√ºren. Das √ºbertrifft aber locker das von etwa "Project Cars". Nat√ºrlich ist es, wie bei jeder Simulation, eine Notwendigkeit, erstmal sein Lenkrad ingame nach seinen Bed√ºrfnissen einzustellen.

Einstellen kann man nat√ºrlich auch an den Rennwagen so Einiges. Jede deutliche √Ñnderung ist auch deutlich sp√ºrbar. Die KI ist meist in Ordnung, hat aber auch ihre Aussetzer.

F√ºr lau bekommt man einen soliden Einblick ins Rennsimulationsgenre.  

[h1]Wertung:[/h1]
7/10 Atmosph√§re
6/10 Grafik
6/10 Sound
8/10 Handling
8/10 Force-Feedback
7/10 Balancing
8/10 Spielspa√ü

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Kostenloses Rennsimulationsfeeling.

[h1][b]7/10 Gesamtwertung

author: {'steamid': '76561198090229508', 'num_games_owned': 68, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1537576846}
review:
It's free. For a reason. 
It's like a game made for the ps2.. The first weeks of it. 
Graphics, physics, audio: Terrible.

Honestly. This game feels like it was made just when the PS2 got released. Games back then had much better physics and songs and at least had a decent engine note. 

This game is a 1/10.  Don't even try it.. It's not worth your time.   - Also, it took me 3 attempts to run the game. I don't know if it was just my PC but whenever I opened the game, it came up with a config window. After clicking play, the box disappears and nothing else happens. Second time it happened again. 3rd time the config window didn't open but the game did.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141713334', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1536819759}
review:
This game has enormous potential if it had updated graphics and better sounds. It doesnt feel much different from other race sims like AC, PC, Iracing, GTR evo etc. Really if not for the graphics and menus i dont think you'd be able to tell the difference. Its a great free game i think to get people a taste of sim racing. I would'nt say its better than Raceroom the other free offering but its definitely got allot more free content than what raceroom offers. I love the fact its a barebones championship.

Problems
Car sounds are'nt great. Probably slightly better than Project Cars. But not as good as Automobilista or Raceroom.
Cant set deadzone or controller limits from what i can see. Which is a major problem as my setup depends on those features.
Graphics are dated and the tracks are based on real world tracks but face the problem of extremely long pitlanes.

I am still looking for that perfect racing sim that focuses on doing 1 thing great rather than be an average jack of all trades.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010811049', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1732, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1732, 'last_played': 1535441647}
review:
I see a lot of thumbs down reviews here but I have to disagree, especially for a free game...!

I play with a keyboard and yes, it was a nit funky at first but I soon was racing around, hitting the race line almost bang on and really enjoying myself.

I was on a old laptop and was expecting to have to turn all the graphics to zero but it actually performed quite well.

Too many people expect everything for nothing. If you want something super fantastic... Put your hand it your pocket and pay for it.... If you just want a bit of fun to waste a few hours here and there, this is a GREAT game.

And think of the time and effort these developers put into these free games. You are not really giving them the incentive to keep developing if you play it for five minutes then complain that it's not a $100.00 game with every possible option.

IT'S A FREE GAME - USUALLY FOR THE DEVELOPER TO GET SOME FEEDBACK - NOT SLAMMED FOR GIVING US SOMETHING FOR FREE...!

review:
This game is free, I don't understand why people thumbs it down.
For being a free game, Copa Petrobras is a real gift to the players by Reiza Studios. 
You can race with the AI on Interlagos, Taruma, Curitiba, Goiana, Velopark and you can also play a championship.


I have played for more than 50 hours and after that I bought Stock Car Extreme.
Overally, I'm quite happy with this development studio.

review:
Le jeu semblait prometteur, mais il a trop de d√©fauts. 
Le seul jeu de course auquel j'ai jou√© auparavant sur pc, c'est TMNations, donc j'esp√©rais au moins un petit didacticiel pour comprendre l'interface et les commandes, mais il n'y en a pas. Tant qu'on en parle, l'interface est incompr√©hensible ( le didacticiel aurait pu aider), et SURTOUT lorsque vous lancez le jeu pour la premi√®re fois, n'allez pas vous perdre dans les param√®tres ! Vous pouvez tout r√©gler, de l'agressivit√© des bots au temps qu'il fera en jeu, mais rien n'est clair il y trop d'infos √† l'√©cran pour les noobs comme moi.
Tiens, comme on parle des bots, il sont introuvables en jeu, quelque soit le mode de jeu ( simple ou test ) alors qu'ils apparaissent dans le scoreboard. Le dernier mode de jeu est le championnat, que je ne peux pas lancer puisqu'il ne se passe rien lorsque je le s√©lectionne.
Pour r√©sumer : un bon jeu si vous √™tes un habitu√© des jeux de courses de circuit r√©alistes et si vous aimez faire des tours de circuit seul, d√©sesp√©r√©mment seul...

author: {'steamid': '76561198053610707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1563725522}
review:
The driving physics in this game are, I reckon, much better than many of these reviews indicate. What I found was that when setting up my T300RS wheel in Options, everything did not save; it took 4 attempts to make sure all my settings were as I wanted, so watch for that. I know I can get my wheel tuned even better too; pretty good for playing around for about an hour though.

The cars move around well with realistic grip from the tyres. The AI are far from the worst - better than Project Car's first efforts. Sound is not great. Being used to RaceRoom, the GT series, AC, and PC1/2, I have an idea what to expect from a decent sim, and I am not disappointed. The races seem challenging in-game, and all the tracks are new to me, which is great. Lots of the usual sim level adjustment is available from two Garage pages. 

I expect this game will be difficult for anyone not using a wheel, so perhaps that explains a lot of the negative feedback. Enjoy this amazing freebie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198153620014', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1607537185}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197993486470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1572624775}
review:
[EN]
First of all I want to say all the negative reviews of this sim are just plain wrong i guess all the people that wrote/gave a bad review for this sim have never played simracing in their lives. so now for the actuall review of this sim.

if you are a sim racing enthusiast you probably already heard of Reiza Studios, they are the ones that brought us sims such as GSCE (Game Stock Car Extreme) AKA Automobilista. and this sim is pretty much the same as that in terms of perfomance etc as it's basically the same as AMS with less cars etc but exacly the same since CPDM is literarly early version of GSCE.
Copa Petrobras de Marcas is an increadible sim and one of the best free sims out there infact this is the only totally free sim with no micro-transactions etc previous reviewers were complaining about no controller compatibility e.g. xbox controller, racing wheel. If you can't see an already preset for xbox360 controller than you shouldn't even be touching any game, and the whole point of having a sim is to use a wheel not playing it with a control pad. secondly performance wise no FPS Lag spikes  etc no idea what some people on here are doing but there is no lag whatsoever overall this is a sim not an arcade racing game if you can't handle the physics in this sim I doubt you will be able to drive a car in any other Race sim.
I would recommend any sim racing fan this sim to try it out 

[PL]
Przede wszystkim chcƒô powiedzieƒá, ≈ºe wszystkie negatywne recenzje tego Simulatora sƒÖ po prostu b≈Çƒôdne, i my≈õlƒô ≈ºe wszyscy ludzie kt√≥rzy napisali / podali z≈ÇƒÖ recenzjƒô nigdy nie grali w Simracing swoim ≈ºyciu. wiƒôc teraz, a teraz napisze poprawna recenzje co do tego simulatora.

je≈õli jeste≈õ entuzjastƒÖ wy≈õcig√≥w samochodowych, prawdopodobnie ju≈º s≈Çysza≈Çe≈õ o Reiza Studios, to oni przynie≈õli nam simy, takie jak GSCE (Game Stock Car Extreme) tzw Automobilista. I ta symulacja jest prawie taka sama jak w kategoriach wydajno≈õci itp., poniewa≈º jest w zasadzie taka sama jak AMS z mniej iloma samochodami itp., ale dok≈Çadnie tak samo, poniewa≈º CPDM jest dos≈Çownie wczesnƒÖ wersjƒÖ GSCE.
Copa Petrobras de Marcas to jest wysmienity simulator i jeden z najlepszych darmowych sim√≥w. To jest jedyna ca≈Çkowicie bezp≈Çatna gra sim, bez mikro-transakcji itp. Poprzedni recenzenci skar≈ºyli siƒô na brak zgodno≈õci z kontrolerami, np. kontroler Xbox, kierownica. Je≈õli nie widzisz ju≈º ustawien dla pada Xbox360, to nie powiniene≈õ nawet dotykaƒá ≈ºadnej gry, a ca≈Çy sens sima, posiadania na u≈ºyciu kierwonicy anie graniu z padem. po drugie wydajno≈õƒá nie ma spiƒôƒá w FPS itp. nie mam pojƒôcia co robiƒÖ niekt√≥rzy ludzie ale nie ma ≈ºadnych op√≥≈∫nie≈Ñ. og√≥lnie rzecz biorƒÖc, to nie jest arcade gra wy≈õcigowa typu NFS itd. je≈õli nie potrafisz sobie poradziƒá z fizykƒÖ w tej grze wƒÖtpiƒô zebys byl w stanie prowadzic auta w innych symulacji wyscigowych.

review: Overall, game is okay. I would have liked to play online, but there is no online. Physics are realistic, almost too realistic. The Impreza's default engine is too weak so you can't get the rear wheels to backspin into a drift. Overall there is a lot of understeer in this game, for the limited time I played, about 5 minutes. It's not bad and I don't regret it filling up my hard-drive space.

review: This is a very good game for the low price of FREE. Sure, it doesn't have much in content but that's okay. This is a taste of what sim racing is like. Because this game is based on isiMotor 2, it's easy to pick up and play and pretty playable on a controller. No multiplayer unfortunately. If you want that, just go ahead and buy Automobilista, which has tons of cars and tracks and an amazing community, albeit a small one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198407450057', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1588327163}
review: Quando l'ho scaricato per provarlo ero un po scettico, ma dopo sono rimasto davvero sorpreso da questo simulatore free to play! Mi ha davvero colpito positivamente il fatto che sia del tutto realistico e simulativo, inoltre ha anche le licenze del campionato in questione e di tutte le auto che vi prendono parte, essendo infatti il gioco ufficiale della Copa Petrobras.. Davvero sorprendente tutto questo in un simulatore completamente gratuito! Ed √® un simulatore degno di questo nome, potrebbe essere tranquillamente a pagamento per il suo livello altissimo di simulazione, infatti √® di gran lunga superiore a molti altri giochi che costano (anche cari) e si ritengono presuntuosamente simulativi quando invece sono tutt'altro.. Assolutamente da provare per tutti gli amanti del genere.. Le uniche pecche sono le poche vetture e i pochi tracciati, ma essendo un gioco gratuito √® del tutto comprensibile. La mancanza pi√π grave, a mio parere, √® la mancanza di una modalit√† multiplayer. Per il resto gioco ottimo, assolutamente consigliato! Se siete in dubbio provatelo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198089898537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1503778426}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999237085', 'num_games_owned': 933, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1599709159}
review: Great little free title for sim racing fans. Racing against AI feels surprisingly good and the championship is immersive. Physics built on the rFactor1 engine are solid with convincing force feedback. A few minor bugs with fixes in the pinned forum threads, and a slightly goofy UI make initial setup not as smooth as it could be, but it's solid once you have that sorted. Highly recommended if you feel like a break from the major racing sims. It feels realistic, is immersive, and for a sim it's actually fun - a sometimes rare commodity. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198194695854', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1499125490}
review:
[h1]Verdict: Fun to drive![/h1]

[h1]Basic info:[/h1]
‚Ä¢ 4 real-world race/touring cars
‚Ä¢ 6 real-world Brazilian asphalt/tarmac tracks
‚Ä¢ 3 modes: test drive, single race, & championship
‚Ä¢ Single-player vs. AI (no multi-player)
‚Ä¢ [url]http://www.gamemarcas.com.br/index.php/en/game-info-en[/url]

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
‚Ä¢ Excellent sim-like physics/handling
‚Ä¢ Looks good
‚Ä¢ Sounds good
‚Ä¢ Lots of configurable settings
‚Ä¢ Free (no micro-transactions, no ads, no strings attached)

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
‚Ä¢ Not very user-friendly
‚Ä¢ Bare-bones (like a demo, not a full product)
‚Ä¢ No track mini-map on the HUD (?)

[h1]Summary:[/h1]
When I finally got some settings configured to my liking and hit the track, this free Copa Petrobras de Marcas game immediately impressed me. It doesn't have much content, and configuration is a little confusing without much in-game on-screen descriptive help, but the actual driving & racing is high-quality. If you want to try a sim-like racing game but don't yet want to take a risk on buying something unfamiliar, definitely give CPdM a shot. If you like it & want more, buy Automobilista (made by the same company: Reiza).

author: {'steamid': '76561198347788589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1146, 'last_played': 1497304130}
review:
Nederlands:

Alles bij elkaar genomen is it een goede race simulator, zeker wanneer je bedenkt dat je het gratis spelen kan. Copa Petrobras de Marcast bevat niet heel veel auto's en circuits, maar het beeld, geluid en vooral het racegevoel is gewoon goed te noemen en zeker de moeite waard eens geprobeerd te hebben. Voordat je er erg in hebt ben je meerdere uren kwijt terwijl je de typisch Zuid Amerikaanse circuits onveilig maakt. 

English:

All and all this is a pretty good racing sim, especially when considering it is free to play. Copa Petrobras de Marcast does not contain a lot of cars and tracks, but the quality of the graphics, sound and racing experience can only be qualified as good. Before you know it you are racing for quite a few hours on typical South American tracks.

review:
Copa Petrobras de Marcas ist ein kostenloses Rennspiel zur brasilianischen Tourenwagenserie. Finanziert vom Hauptsponsor der Rennserie. Grafisch durchaus ansprechend, sehr detalliert, sch√∂nes Rennspiel f√ºr Fans des Genres und der Tourenwagenrennen. Was mich gest√∂rt hat war die als Standard festgelegte Tastaturbelegung. Aber die kann man √§ndern und wer Rennspiele ernsthaft spielen m√∂chte nimmt ohnehin ein Lenkrad oder zumindest ein Gamepad und murkst nicht wie ich mit Maus&Tastatur herum. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZH83263uTfo

author: {'steamid': '76561198085794697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1488129158}
review:
There are alot of negative reviews.
Keep in mind before purchasing, this is a simulation, NOT NEED FOR SPEED!
This game will punish you when you mess up, require you to get pitstops, and make you actually try to turn.
It isn ot for 10 yr old Jeremy who plays Need for Speed: Most Wanted 2012 all day and thinks he's a pro racer.

1). This game has limited cars because real stock racing has limited cars, DO NOT WHINE ABOUT IT
2). This game has realistic physics
3). You may change settings to what your prefer
4). Don't cry to your mommy because you lost, this game is not easy
5). No, you may NOT hit the other cars and get away with it
6). Have fun with oyur SIMULATION

This is reccomended for people who enjoy stock cars.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047364141', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1485711679}
review:
Now don't get me wrong, the driving in this game is quite solid and the visuals are quite good too. Heck, the cars even sound great. Think of it as HIGHLY polished content for rFactor. Purely by driving experience, I'd say it's pretty neat.

So why the thumbs down? The game's accessibility is downright terrible. Even Assetto and rFactor are better in this front. Every racing sim, free or not, must come with atleast one of the following - Racing Line, Minimap or Co-Driver. I'm not familiar with any of these tracks, and that is in fact a good thing as it brings up fresh content to drive on, but this becomes a bane when you don't have navigational assistance on the track. This is a major putoff for a casual player like me.

PS - If there really is a Racing Line/Minimap feature, please let me know and I'll update this. TIll then, I'll get my kicks from  rF and NR2003 :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198022480306', 'num_games_owned': 420, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1477750013}
review:
I try this game upon recommendation on my Project Cars- Pagani Edition review.
For a free game...the result is somewhat pretty below expectation.
The graphic look dated and seem pretty clunky.....
The in game interface is not inviting and not user friendly.
You have limited choices of car to choose from.
For a more better car racing gameplay I would recommend try out
Project Cars- Pagani Edition or Grid 2 Demo
It was more fun and satisfying compare to Copa Petrobras de Marcas.

review:
Olha, chega a doer os olho ao ler algumas an√°lises do game na steam, um reclamando dos gr√°ficos, outro reclamando da f√≠sica dificil de pilotar, at√© gente reclamando por n√£o conseguir jogar no TECLADO? Pelamor cara, √© s√©rio isso? Tu dirige um carro na vida real com teclado de computador tbm? √â obvio que √© dificil, o game √© um simulador, o minimo que precisa pra jogar de forma menos desconfortavel seria um joystick, mas nada se compara a jogar comum volante. 
A Reiza d√° o game de gra√ßa que j√° √© uma coisa bem legal ai vem os cara que ta acostumado com jogo de corrida arcade desmerecer todo o trabalho dos cara, lament√°vel mesmo, ainda mais vindo tanta reclama√ß√£o de brasileiro, ou seja, incentivo ZERO para os caras continuarem seu trabalho.

Falando do game agora: 
*Gostei da f√≠sica a la RFactor, os comandos respondem precisamente, o forcefeedback n√£o deixa a desejar assim como o visual que eu particularmente n√£o tenho absolutamente nada a reclamar, os efeitos son√≥ros s√£o muito bons tamb√©m por√©m n√£o posso deixar de observar a ausencia de um multiplayer, o que joga fora uma grande parte do potencial do game. No mais, um √≥timo simulador, mais ainda por ser de gra√ßa !!!

Pela ausencia de um multiplayer, mais op√ß√µes de carros e pistas, nota 8.5/10 !!!

review:
√â um jogo que recomendado por ser gratuito. Sendo indicado principalmente pra quem gosta de simuladores de corrida.
O carregamentos das partidas √© demorado. O jogo tamb√©m n√£o conta com multyplay, al√©m de ter poucos carros dispon√≠veis. Mesmo assim aparenta ser bem desafiante a IA do jogo. O barulho do motor do carro irrita Bastante, dando vontade de baixar o volume pra jogar. Os comandos s√£o bastante chatos de se adaptar, fugindo dos padr√µes de jogo de corrida onde "A" acelera e "S" freia. Mas √© poss√≠vel configurar as teclas de acordo com o gosto do jogador.
O jogo √© estilo simulador, e isso acaba a fastando jogadores casuais  que n√£o querem perder muito tempo aprendendo as t√°ticas para ganhar uma corrida. N√£o joguei muito o jogo por achar meio complicado. Mesmo assim indico pra quem tem muito tempo livre pra  jogar e n√£o quer pagar em um jogo de corrida muito superior.

review:
Amazing Simulation Game!
It is free, a great and realistic simulator, and has decent graphics. What better to expect for free? This is absolutely great, I have had 3 hrs on this so far, and am enjoying it! You can run it on basically any PC which is a good thing. I love the difficulty and hardcore gameplay, it really adds that extra touch to it, making it the best sim I have ever played, that is free. I am expecting more from Reiza Studios, keep it up!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197992257920', 'num_games_owned': 484, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1550603655}
review:
One of the best sim games I've ever played, and it's free. Ignore my low play time, I usually play these cars within the game this is effectively a giant demo for, Stock Car Extreme. But they drive exactly the same in this.
Physics are brilliant, not many people doing better sims that Reiza at the moment.
Graphics are a little dated, but well optimised and look and run fine on low end hardware.
AI seems pretty decent too. 
If you want an arcade racing experience go elsewhere, but if you currently play Forza or GT and you're ready to try something a bit more advanced to see if you like it, this is a very good way to do so for free. And your steering wheel from your Playstation or Xbox will probably work on the PC, too, if it's one of the good ones.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083311272', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 702, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 470, 'last_played': 1469343224}
review:
I like this game. 

It's more of a sim than it is an arcade racer but it does have some elements of an arcade racer I suppose in that you can get racing with minimal fuss in just a few minutes if you so wish thanks to a generous amount of driving aids and a clean menu which allows you to get involved in some racing action in just a few clicks. 
But it has depth as well and you can spend time fine-tuning your vehicles and working on your lines and braking points etc. I like that it supports controller use, because I'm not in the mood to get out my wheel setup right now and just want to put a few laps ina nd have a few races but I do look forward to playing with a wheel as well - the physics feel impressive enough with a pad and even though I'm no fan of FF cars, this game seems to have made them enjoyable to drive and that's all you can ask for really.

It's rewarding, enjoyable, there's a decent amount of content for the price... and oh yeh the price - it's FREE. So no complaints here...

Thanks to Reiza for giving this one away. I'm already contemplating investing in AMS as it too looks great.

Thumbs up :)

Mise √† part celas ce jeux a une vari√©t√© moyenne de vehicule et de circuits les vehicules sont plus du wtcc que tu F1: Les bots je ne les ais pas essayer mais au premier oeil il paraisse assez bien organiser ils vous foncent pas dedans tous le temps.

CE JEUX VAUT IL LE COUP ? Pour les personnes  qui recherche de la simulation pure et dure qui comptent y jouer des heures non mais pour les simples amateurs qu'il ne savent pas quoi faire de 10 voir 30 min c'est possible que ce jeux est fait pour vous.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998043856', 'num_games_owned': 1178, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1456168484}
review:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: This game is a hardcore "racing simulator", therefore, it sould be played using a driving wheel controller. 
If you don't understand the above notice, then please don't play this game, and don't post reviews about how the game is not playable using  the keyboard! By doing so, you are hurting a great developer, who are very good at what they do (making racing [i]simulators[/i]).

This game can be considered as demo for "Stock Car Extreme" and "Automobilista Motorsport Simulator". You sould try this free game if you are interested in them, or interested in [i]Automobilista[/i] especially, since it is the newer version of the former. The driving model and physics is great. The force feedback is the best in all racing simulators IMO. The AI is competitive enough to race against. 
All in all, if you are interested in racing simulators genre, this is the perfect game to introduce you the sim racing world! But be sure to try it using a proper racing wheel controller!

review:

It's a free racing sim. On one hand, you can't beat that price, and it's fairly realistic (with an almost obsessive attention to detail when it comes to car settings). On the other hand, the audio is just kinda there, and the graphics are nothing to write home about. 

7/10 give it a shot if you want a sim about touring cars.

review:
Just like race 07 which is an ageless game, this is the kind of game I would suggest to anyone who doesnt really know racing sims but wants to try one as this is about as sim like as you can get. Its free and you can mess around with your car setup, your controller setting and Im guessing you could probably mod this game all crazy like.

So yeah its a quality sim with easy on the pc graphics that is decently fun.

review:
Very good game considering the price...Thank you Reiza.

It isn't the prettiest as far as the graphics, but it is a racing simulator without a doubt. Works fine with my G27 and triple monitors. There are no strings attached, it's fun and it's free!

review: Sehr gutes Game !!! Es ist der Pedant zu "Race07" bzw, "GTR2"... nur das diese Game etwas einfacher gehalten ist und "NICHT" ganz so umfanreich ist. Das macht aber nichts, denn es gibt auf den "einschl√§gigen" WEB-Sites MODs!!! ;-) Die Fahr-Physik ist eher simulations lastig, aber gut beherschbar (besonders mit eingeschalteten Fahrhilfen). Mit einem PC-Lenkrad kommt richtig gutes Feeling r√ºber. Grosses Lob an die entwickler & bitte bleibt mit neuen UpDates dran. Ein kleiner Kritik-Punkt bleibt aber: "Die Motoren-Sounds der Autos sind (mir pers√∂nlich) viel zu zahm & lasch. ANMERKUNG an die jenigen, die das GAME wegen dem "Fahr-Verhalten" kritiesieren & eine schlechte Bewertung abgegeben haben: "Wer einen "Arcade-Racer" sucht ist hier falsch, also lasst BITTE die schlechten Reviews oder lernt das fahren, DANKE!!! PS.: Das Game h√§tte Ich auch f√ºr bis zu 15‚Ç¨ gekauft es ist es Wert !!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198050309205', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1461732578}
review:
This is marked as 'Mixed' as far as peoples impressions of this game, n I gotta wonder - why?
This game is really f'n AWESOME. Now I must admit, I am a little bias, as I used a wheel and pedal combo, and was just thoughly impressed with how quick, easy, and just 'bloody correct' ALL the mappings were THE 1st TIME I SET THEM I might add. That's been rare lately.
I found this to be really engrosing. I felt as if I were racing IN A CAR.
Don't get me wrong. I also own Gran Turismo 5 on my PS3, and Forsa 5 and 6 on my Xbox One. This ain't like them, but as far as cost vs return - Yeah, bloody good game.
Thanks.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982295752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2097, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1599940895}
review:
Free Auto Racing simulator,  It worked, Played great, Looked Great, Sounded great.  Very complex simulator, if you you don't know racing games you might not know what to do.  No tutorial.  Keyboard control might be too hard, xbox controler might work with some playing around. If you have a complete driving wheel, you should get this game.  You might have to reconfigure your controls to work with what you have. Plenty of options and dificulty controls.  Personally, i don't know about racing or play racing games, but tried it out with xbox controller.  Didn't see anything to buy.

For more info:

author: {'steamid': '76561197996600089', 'num_games_owned': 504, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1514735151}
review:
This is a good racing game. The physics are believable. Even though they are not very detailed, they are sufficient for this game.

More importantly, this game allows you to map your inputs freely, like any game that respects the player does. 

also, there is none of this modern "steering dampening" nonsense where your gamepad is supposed to feel like a wheel that only turns slowly.

No, this game respects you and your inputs. it doesn't mess with your steering curvature.

and the in game wheels are moving in sync with your controller and as fast as you can move the controller. I wish every racing game controlled like this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162314703', 'num_games_owned': 553, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1453252506}
review:
Copa Petrobras de Marcas is an OK game, not too great. It's free, so I can't say much too bad about it. The default controls are different than in most games, so if you don't change them from the beginning, you will be driving way off. There are many cool things about this game- pitstops, gauges and meters, while tracking tires and other things. Also, you can change the camera views in different ways than in most games (i.e. side mirrors).

-Pro: You can choose different variations of the Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution X from the start.
-Con: No multi-player mode.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051812043', 'num_games_owned': 1208, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1452617135}
review:
Hubiese sido un gran juego....si hubiese salido hace 10 a√±os.

Los gr√°ficos son muy bajos, se puede jugar a 1080, en ultra perfectamente con un ordenador normal.
Por lo que hab√° le√≠do lo mejor del juego es su buena simulaci√≥n, a mi parecer no es muy buena que se diga, perotampoco esta mal. Tiene pocos mapas, poquisimos vehiculos,... Viene siendo un juego pobre.

Loo mejor que tiene sin duda son todas las posibilidades de ajuste, tanto para controles, como para el vehiculo en general. Aun que para empezar se juega fatal, hasta que descubres que mas que jugar tu, esta jugando el ordenador y no te permite acer grandes cosas, ya que viene con modo dios, ayuda de frenada, ayuda de direcci√≥n, ... todo activado. Es imposible hasta derrapar hasta que no le quitas todos los controles de estabilidad, bloqueo de frenos,...

Es horrible cuando se sale fuera de la pista, parece que hubiese un terremoto y la suspensi√≥n derecha del coche entra en caos total, apesar de que todo el suelo del juego es completamente liso, ni se les ocurrio la idea de hacerle algunas hierbas.

Por lo menos es Free To Play (menos mal), si no, totalmente no recomendar√≠a el juego. Esta bien para hecharse unas carreras y probar cosas, pero solo eso, no tiene multijugador, asi que te tiene que gustar mucho para hecharle horas.

[h1] 6/10 [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198140406085', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1447623375}
review:
Copa Petrobras de Marcas.

Is this a fun game? Yes.

Is this a multiplayer game? Sadly no.

Would it be worth paying 10 bucks for if it wasn't free? No.

The reason why it's not worth 10 bucks is because it's only singleplayer, and you can only race a couple of track.

And there aren't that many cars. So no, it's a fun game. But not worth much money.


But that's why it's free, do I recommend it??? Ummmmm. Well, for the racing itself yes. And if your gonna get this game, that's probably what your into.


But for the game itself? Nope. It's good as a free game but look at Trove for an example of what a great free game is (it's not even constricting, you don't need to buy anything even though it does have microtransactions).



Now I know I clicked the "No" on the "Do you recommend this game" thing. But here is the thing, I wouldn't recommend it for the lack of features, not for the racing. So if your not bothered by this then go and get it. The racing is great, the features, not so much.

review:

+ : Tr√®s r√©aliste et facilement personnalisable le jeu est agr√©able et plaisant. Il vous offre de multiple param√®tres pour modifier le comportement de votre v√©hicule mais de la viens les d√©faults.
- : Trop court pas assez de circuits, il y a tellement d'options qu'on s'y perd ! Pas de carri√®re dommage pour un jeu suppos√© √™tre une simulation de course, pas d'arr√™ts au stand √ßa aurait √©t√© plus cool de les mettre.
Bref si vous n'√™tes pas difficile pour les jeux de courses celui-ci vous plaira, en revanche si vous tentez pour la premi√®re fois ce type de jeu passez votre chemin vous le trouveriez trop complexe. Sinc√®rement je ne suis pas un pro mais je voulais juste un jeu de course avec un championnat et de la comp√©ttion et bien j'ai √©t√© ravi. author: {'steamid': '76561198151042255', 'num_games_owned': 11, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1430356632}
review:
√â isso o que acontece quando vc coloca um simulador "gratuito" pra muita gente. Jogadores de Need For Speed n√£o sabem o que est√£o pilotando e a√≠ d√£o reviews negativas. Uma pena existir tanta gente ignorante assim. 
Se vc ta procurando dar uma olhada nos produtos da Reiza esse simulador pode te dar uma ajuda, mas claro ele √© bem limitado por se gratis. Mas vale muito apena mesmo assim. Recomendo comprar o Stock Car Extreme que ja inclui esses carros.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993211832', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1448598581}
review: This is a good game although you might not understand why. Reiza is the studio behind the title and they are well respected in the sim racing world. They're up there with iRacing, RaceRoom, Assetto Corsa, and PCars. The game is based off the Game Stock Car Extreme simulation engine, it's simulation not arcade, and that's a good thing. The engine is dated visually but Reiza keeps brining it along with new physics and features and, honestly, it looks half decent. The full game, including test days, practices, qualifying, full races with full AI grids, etc., is completely free. I honestly think Reiza should charge $5-10 for this package and it would still be well worth it. It took me a few minutes to setup my wheel in the controls, just be sure to do that first. Enjoy the game!

author: {'steamid': '76561197972249070', 'num_games_owned': 214, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1443549153}
review:
i only recomend this game because it is completely FREE and only 2GB download. TRy it!
i suggest though ot use this game for an additional car and track combination of race tracks not often used in games. keep in mind to use it only for private practice without AI. because the AI is in that sense terrible that they dont understand ''2 wide'' (if you are on their out- or inside they ignore you and ramm you off the track if you block their race line.) they can only drive 2 wide with other AI.
other than that it's decent looking, nice controls, easy setup. many pre configured wheel-setups.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034873474', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 7590, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 763, 'last_played': 1457005652}
review:
I can't really believe this game is free. I'm a big fan of Reiza Studios for their other sims (GSC Extreme and FT2013) which I have since their original release (before it was on Steam) and this small team gave us some of the best sims for years with those titles. 

And Copa de Marcas is no different, it's a great sim of a cool racing series with accurate models and tracks.

If you are looking for a true sim, look no further. Try this game and look for the other titles from Reiza Studios as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083096762', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1428784449}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198061764316', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1441514825}
review:
An awesome simulation racing game but you arcade racers out there better buckle up too. Why? Because you can adjust the options to turn this into an arcade racer! Please do not be the one to look at a few negative reviews and then not get this game if you like to race you would be missing out on a lot. I even adjusted the keyboard controls and its completely playable PLAYABLE ON A KEYBOARD!

So for everything I have tried in this game including the night time racing I would have to give it a 10/10 I mean its not that often you get a game this extensive that is ACTUALLY FREE! You read that right FREE meaning NO MICROTRANSACTIONS! The devs deserve the rightful praise of this game because of what they have done.

Thank you if you read this review in its entirety.
